attributes.action: Make funding available to bring start date back to the original 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who live in Mottram, Hollingworth, and Tintwistle, are being choked by exhaust fumes from cars and HGV's alike. Proposals have already been submitted and accepted, but the start date has been put back 3 years and funding has been diverted to other projects. Please allow us to live safely and free up our villages from daily gridlock (x2)

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
